commands.description: Shows the help message with available commands.
Replies with you are welcome message to the invoker.
Formats the C# code using CSharpier (only for **.NET** projects).
Fixes the csproj file with packages.config version of NuGet packages (only for **.NET Framework** projects).
Enable review for the target pull request. This is useful when the PR submitter wasn't in the watch list before or the webhook was not captured or some failed scenario occurred.
Tracks the specified pull request. Queue a build, raise **[dependabot](https://github.com/dependabot) recreate** comment to resolve conflicts and synchronize merge branches.
